libsvm

Class SelfOptimizingLinearLibSVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.javaml.classification.AbstractClassifier
      • libsvm.LibSVM
        • libsvm.SelfOptimizingLinearLibSVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Classifier

    public class SelfOptimizingLinearLibSVM
extends LibSVM
    A svm variant the optimizes the C-paramater by itself.
    Author:
    Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)
    See Also:

      • classDistribution

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Double> classDistribution(Instance instance)
        Description copied from interface: Classifier
        Generate the membership distribution for this instance using this classifier. All values should be in the interval [0,1] Note: The returned map may not contain a value for all classes that were present in the data set used for training. If the map does not contain a value, the value for that class equals zero.
        Specified by:
        classDistribution in interface Classifier
        Overrides:
        classDistribution in class AbstractClassifier
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance to be classified
        Returns:
        an array with membership degrees for all the various classes in the data set
